job_history.work_description: Maintaining and growing the Real Estate category. Helping clients understand and utilize Pa Media Group's digital marketing platforms to secure leads and boost brand awareness.
Growing and retaining new and old healthcare related businesses. Finding new business opportunities and maintaining current book of business.

job_history.role_name: Real Estate/ Executive Marketing Media Consultant
job_history.work_description: Learning, understanding, and selling all products of the media kit. Maintaining own book of business and creating new relationships.
Working with customers, creating documents, coordinating events, and designing a brochure.
Greeting customers, assisting with choices, problems, and getting products, selling credit card, running cash register, and creating displays.
